<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Marks given group for auto-deletion when group is empty. [[true|True]] will mark the group for auto-deletion, however [[false]] will only unmark the group that was marked previously. Other engine group auto-deletion mechanisms in place are not affected by this.

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> It might take up to a minute for the groups marked for auto-deletion when empty to get deleted when they become empty.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  group [[deleteGroupWhenEmpty]] delete

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> delete: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to mark for auto-deletion

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_group [[deleteGroupWhenEmpty]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[deleteGroup]], [[isGroupDeletedWhenEmpty]], [[createGroup]], [[group]], [[setGroupId]], [[groupID]], [[units]], [[groupFromNetId]], [[netId]], [[leader]], [[selectLeader]], [[join]], [[createCenter]], [[createUnit]], [[createVehicle]], [[Side]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">

<dd class="notedate">Posted on February 8, 2018 - 22:01 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Wyqer|Wyqer]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
It seems, that the argument has to be local (like for deleteGroup).
So if you run it on a server and the group isn't local to the server this wouldn't work:
<code>_group [[deleteGroupWhenEmpty]] [[true]];</code>
But this would work:
<code>[[if]] ([[local]] _group) [[then]] {
    _group [[deleteGroupWhenEmpty]] [[true]];
} [[else]] {
    [_group, [[true]]] [[remoteExec]] ["[[deleteGroupWhenEmpty]]", [[groupOwner]] _group];
};</code>
</dd>

</dl>
